user_query: I'm planning a family vacation and want to make sure the hotel we choose is safe. Can you check the domain authority and page rank of the hotel's website, hotelxyz.com? Additionally, please verify the email address reservations@hotelxyz.com to ensure it is valid.

TaskList.description: Check the domain authority and page rank of the hotel's website hotelxyz.com.
Verify the email address reservations@hotelxyz.com to ensure it is valid.
